name: Ms.Swetha
greetingText: How would u like a promotion..?
text1: ...from my Best friend to My GirlFriend with with the potential of higher roles in the future
textInChatBox: Will you be my Valentine?❤️ I love you and miss you so much.....
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I love the feeling I get when you smile. I would love to smile with you for the rest of my life 💘
replayText: PROS: 💗I'll always love you(I guess so😂) 💗100% Honesty 💗I'll obsessed with you 💗Good at roasting(You)
replayText2: CONS: 💙You can't run away from me Iykiyk 💙Might take some stupid decisions(hopefully this is not one of those)
